name: Big Spender
description:
Big Spender is my submission to the 1st Juicy Jam. It's a shopping simulator, where your goal is to buy all of the different items in the shop. However, if you don't have enough money, you can exit the shop and kill maggots to get more money.

FEATURES:

- Press 'E' to interact with items and buy them

- Prices in the shop will also get lower as you get more luck

- Chance to do a critical strike on maggots which does double damage and scales with luck

- Killing maggots will slightly increase your luck

- A counter on the top right for how many items you have, and how many you have left to buy (disappears when not in the shop)

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

LeftClick - Damage the maggots

E - Buy an item if you're close to it and have enough money

Esc - Takes you back to the main menu,  and if you're already there, it exits the game

Have fun! Thank you for playing my game!
